title: pwdgenerator
description: This repo contains an application that can be used to randomly generate a password, based on a selection of options.

title: TeamProfile-Composer
description: This repo contains a Node.js command-line application which takes information about employees on a software engineering team and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.

title: generatingReadmes
description: This repo contains an interactive command-line application that prompts a user for information about an application repository and uses the input to generate a high-quality, professional README.md.

title: Weatha4cast
description: This repo contains a weather dashboard with form inputs that allows a user to search for a city.

title: hour-ly
description: This repo contains a simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day.

title: Devint-quiz
description: This repo contains an interactive coding challenge containing a series of multiple choice questions.
